name: qualys
label: Qualys
description: Qualys provides cloud security, compliance and protection of IT assets and web applications. This connector facilitates the automated operations for vulnerability management, policy compliance, asset management

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: API Server URL of the Qualys Cloud that you want to use for API requests. This will depend on the platform where your account is located.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Username used to connect to the Qualys Cloud to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Password used to connect to the Qualys Cloud to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Add Assets
operations.description: Adds assets, i.e., IP addresses, to the subscription on the Qualys cloud, based on the IP addresses and other input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: IPs/Ranges
parameters.name: ips
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: Hosts (IP addresses) that you want to add to the subscription on the Qualys cloud.You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-).For example, xx.xx.xx.1, xx.xx.xx.1-xx.xx.xx.10

parameters.title: Add to Vulnerability Management Module
parameters.name: enable_vm
parameters.tooltip: Enable the hosts for the VM application
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to true, to enable the hosts for the VM application. By default, this is set to False.

parameters.title: Add to Policy Compliance Module
parameters.name: enable_pc
parameters.tooltip: Enable the hosts for the PC application
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to true, to enable the hosts for the PC application. By default, this is set to False.

parameters.title: Tracking Method
parameters.name: tracking_method
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the tracking method used for the IP address that you want to add on the Qualys cloud. You can choose from the following IP, DNS, or NETBIOS. By default, this is set to IP.

parameters.title: Owner
parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: (Optional) Owner of the host asset(s).

parameters.title: Attribute 1
parameters.name: ud1
parameters.tooltip: Define host attribute name that will appear when viewing host information
parameters.description: (Optional) Host attribute name that is displayed while viewing host information. This is a user-defined field. You can define up to 3 attributes while adding an asset.

parameters.title: Attribute 2
parameters.name: ud2
parameters.tooltip: Define host attribute name that will appear when viewing host information
parameters.description: (Optional) Host attribute name that is displayed while viewing host information. This is a user-defined field. You can define up to 3 attributes while adding an asset.

parameters.title: Attribute 3
parameters.name: ud3
parameters.tooltip: Define host attribute name that will appear when viewing host information
parameters.description: (Optional) Host attribute name that is displayed while viewing host information. This is a user-defined field. You can define up to 3 attributes while adding an asset.

parameters.title: Comments
parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: (Optional) User-defined comments that you want to add while adding an asset.

parameters.title: Asset Group Title
parameters.name: ag_title
parameters.tooltip: Required if the request is being made by a Unit Manager otherwise invalid. The title of an asset group in the Unit Manager’s business unit that the host(s) will be added to.
parameters.description: (Optional) Title of an asset group in the Unit Manager’s business unit to which the host(s) will be added. Note: This parameter is valid and required only if the request is being made by the Unit Manager.

operations.title: Get Asset List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of all IP addresses that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific IP addresses based on the input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: IPs/Ranges
parameters.name: ips
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: Hosts (IP addresses) for which you want to retrieve details from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-). For example, xx.xx.xx.1, xx.xx.xx.1-xx.xx.xx.10

parameters.title: Tracking Method
parameters.name: tracking_method
parameters.description: Select the tracking method used, i.e., retrieve a list for only those IP addresses that have been tracked using the selected tracking method from the Qualys cloud. You can choose from the following IP, DNS, or NETBIOS. By default, this is set to IP.

parameters.title: Network ID
parameters.name: network_id
parameters.tooltip: Show a list for only those IP addresses that have the specified network ID
parameters.description: Specify the Network ID, i.e., retrieve a list for only those IP addresses that have the specified network ID from the Qualys cloud. Note: This parameter is valid only when the Network Support feature is enabled for the user’s account.

parameters.title: Compliance Enabled
parameters.name: compliance_enabled
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to true, to retrieve a list for only those IP addresses from the user’s account that are assigned to the Policy Compliance module on the Qualys cloud.Clear this option, i.e., set it to false, to retrieve a list for only those IP addresses from the user’s account that are not assigned to the Policy Compliance module on the Qualys cloud. Note: This parameter is valid only when the Policy Compliance module is enabled for the user’s account.

operations.title: Update Asset
operations.description: Updates assets, i.e., existing IP addresses, in the subscription on the Qualys cloud, based on the IP addresses and other input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: IPS/Ranges
parameters.name: ips
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: Hosts (IP addresses) that you want to update in the subscription on the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-).For example, xx.xx.xx.1, xx.xx.xx.1-xx.xx.xx.10

parameters.title: Tracking Method
parameters.name: tracking_method
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the tracking method used for the IP address that you want to update on the Qualys cloud.You can choose from the following IP, DNS, or NETBIOS.By default, this is set to IP.

parameters.title: Host DNS
parameters.name: host_dns
parameters.description: (Optional)  The DNS hostname for the IP you want to update.A single IP must be specified in the same request and the IP will only be updated if it matches the hostname specified.
parameters.tooltip: A single IP must be specified in the same request and the IP will only be updated if it matches the DNS hostname specified.

parameters.title: Host NETBIOS
parameters.name: host_netbios
parameters.description: (Optional) The NetBIOS hostname for the IP you want to update. A single IP must be specified in the same request and the IP will only be updated if it matches the hostname specified.
parameters.tooltip: A single IP must be specified in the same request and the IP will only be updated if it matches the NetBIOS hostname specified.

parameters.title: Owner
parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: (Optional) Owner of the host asset(s).

parameters.title: Attribute 1
parameters.name: ud1
parameters.tooltip: Define host attribute name that will appear when viewing host information
parameters.description: (Optional) Host attribute name that is displayed while viewing host information. This is a user-defined field. You can define up to 3 attributes while adding an asset.

parameters.title: Attribute 2
parameters.name: ud2
parameters.tooltip: Define host attribute name that will appear when viewing host information
parameters.description: (Optional) Host attribute name that is displayed while viewing host information. This is a user-defined field. You can define up to 3 attributes while adding an asset.

parameters.title: Attribute 3
parameters.name: ud3
parameters.tooltip: Define host attribute name that will appear when viewing host information
parameters.description: (Optional) Host attribute name that is displayed while viewing host information. This is a user-defined field. You can define up to 3 attributes while adding an asset.

parameters.title: Comments
parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: (Optional) User-defined comments that you want to add while updating an asset.

operations.title: Get Scanned Host List
operations.description: Retrieves the list and details of all scanned hosts that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific scanned hosts based on the input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: Details
parameters.name: details
parameters.tooltip: Choose the amount of host information you want to retrieve for each host
parameters.description: Choose the amount of host information you want to retrieve for each host from the Qualys cloud. You can choose from the following values: Basic (Default): Retrieves basic host information that includes the host ID, IP address, tracking method, DNS and NetBIOS hostnames, and operating system, from the Qualys cloud. Basic/AGs: Retrieves basic host information plus asset group information, which includes asset group ID and title, from the Qualys cloud. All: Retrieves all host information that includes the basic host information plus the last vulnerability and compliance scan dates, from the Qualys cloud. All/AGs: Retrieves all host information plus asset group information, which includes asset group ID and title, from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: IPs/Ranges
parameters.name: ips
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: Hosts (IP addresses) for which you want to retrieve scanned host details from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-). For example, xx.xx.xx.1, xx.xx.xx.1-xx.xx.xx.10

parameters.title: Host IDs
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: Host IDs whose scan details you want to retrieve from the Qualys cloud. In this case, scan details of only those host IDs that have specified will be retrieved from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple hosts using a comma separator, or you can add a range of hosts using a hyphen (-).

parameters.title: Asset Group IDs
parameters.name: ag_ids
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: Asset Group IDs whose host scan details you want to retrieve from the Qualys cloud. In this case, scan details of only those hosts that are part of the Asset Groups that have specified will be retrieved from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IDs using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IDs using a hyphen (-). You can specify either the Asset Group IDs or the Asset Group titles but not both.

parameters.title: Asset Group Titles
parameters.name: ag_titles
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries are comma separated
parameters.description: Asset Groups whose host scan details you want to retrieve from the Qualys cloud. In this case, scan details of only those hosts that are part of the Asset Groups that have specified and which contain certain strings in the asset group title will be retrieved from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple entries using a comma separator. You can specify either the Asset Group IDs or the Asset Group titles but not both.

parameters.title: Show Host with Minimum Host ID
parameters.name: id_min
parameters.description: Minimum Host ID value based on which you want to retrieve host scan details from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Host with Maximum Host ID
parameters.name: id_max
parameters.description: Maximum Host ID value based on which you want to retrieve host scan details from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Host within Network IDs
parameters.name: network_ids
parameters.tooltip: Restrict the request to certain custom network IDs.Multiple network IDs are comma separated
parameters.description: Specify the Network ID, i.e., retrieves a list for only scanned hosts that have the specified network ID from the Qualys cloud. Note: This parameter is valid only when the Network Support feature is enabled for the user’s account.

parameters.title: Show Hosts Not Scanned Since
parameters.name: no_vm_scan_since
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts not scanned since a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve scan details for those hosts that have not been scanned from the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Compliance Hosts Not Scanned Since
parameters.name: no_compliance_scan_since
parameters.tooltip: Show compliance hosts not scanned since a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve scan details for those hosts that have not been scanned for compliance from the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show VM Scan Hosts Since
parameters.name: vm_scan_since
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts that were last scanned for vulnerabilities since a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve scan details for those hosts that have been last scanned for vulnerabilities since the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Compliance Scan Hosts Since
parameters.name: compliance_scan_since
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts that were last scanned for compliance since a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve scan details for those hosts that have been last scanned for compliance since the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show VM Scan Processed Host Before
parameters.name: vm_processed_before
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with vulnerability scan results processed before a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve scan details for those hosts that have vulnerability scan results processed before the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show VM Processed Host After
parameters.name: vm_processed_after
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with vulnerability scan results processed after a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve scan details for those hosts that have vulnerability scan results processed after the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Hosts with VM Scan End Date Before
parameters.name: vm_scan_date_before
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with a vulnerability scan end date before a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve scan details for those hosts that have their vulnerability scan end date before the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Hosts with VM Scan End Date After
parameters.name: vm_scan_date_after
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with a vulnerability scan end date after a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve scan details for those hosts that have their vulnerability scan end date after the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: OS Pattern
parameters.name: os_pattern
parameters.tooltip: To match empty string use : ^$
parameters.description: Retrieve scan details for those hosts that have an operating system matching the regular expression, which you have specified in this field, from the Qualys cloud. For Example  ^Win.*64+bit.*Service+Pack+1 or ^Windows. To match the empty string use '^$'

parameters.title: Truncation Limit
parameters.name: truncation_limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of scanned host records that are processed per request. If you do not specify the truncation limit, then this limit is set to 1000 host records. You can specify a value less than the default (1-999), or greater than the default (1001-1000000).
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of scanned host records that are processed per request. If you do not specify the truncation limit, then this limit is set to 1000 host records. You can specify a value less than the default (1-999), or greater than the default (1001-1000000).

operations.title: Get Asset Group List
operations.description: Retrieves the list and details of asset groups from Qualys based on the input parameters (filters) you have specified

parameters.title: Asset Group IDs
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: Multiple IDs are comma separated
parameters.description: (Optional) Group IDs based on which you want to retrieve the asset group list from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple group IDs using a comma separator.

parameters.title: Minimum Asset Group ID
parameters.name: id_min
parameters.tooltip: Show only asset groups that have an ID greater than or equal to the specified ID
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieve only those asset groups that have an ID greater than or equal to the specified ID from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Maximum Asset Group ID
parameters.name: id_max
parameters.tooltip: Show only asset groups that have an ID less than or equal to the specified ID
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieve only those asset groups that have an ID lesser than or equal to the specified ID from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Asset Group with Business Unit ID
parameters.name: unit_id
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieve only those asset groups that have a business unit ID equal to the specified ID.

parameters.title: Show Asset Group with User ID
parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieve only those asset groups that have a user ID equal to the specified ID.

parameters.title: Show Asset Group with Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.tooltip: Title Must be an exact match
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieve only those asset groups that have a title equal to the specified string. Note: This must be an exact match.

parameters.title: Network IDs
parameters.name: network_ids
parameters.tooltip: Restrict the request to certain custom network IDs. Multiple network IDs are comma separated
parameters.description: (Optional) Valid only when the Networks feature is enabled for your account. Network IDs based on which you want to retrieve the asset group list from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple network IDs using a comma separator.

parameters.title: Truncation Limit
parameters.name: truncation_limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of asset group records to output. By default this is set to 1000 records. If you specify truncation_limit=0, the output is not paginated
parameters.description: (Optional) Maximum number of asset group records that are processed per request from the Qualys cloud. By default, this is set to 1000 records. If you specify truncation_limit=0, the output is not paginated and all records are returned in a single output.

parameters.title: Show Attributes
parameters.name: show_attributes
parameters.tooltip: Select All or list of attribute names
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the attributes that you want to retrieve for each asset group along with the ID. You can choose from the following options:  All ID Title Owner User Name Owner User ID Owner Unit ID Last Update IP Set Appliance List Domain List Host IDs Assigned User IDs Assigned Unit IDs Business Impact CommentsNote:  Select All or list of attribute names.

operations.title: Get Host Detection List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of and details hosts including the hosts latest vulnerability data from Qualys, based on the automatic data available in user's account and other input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: Host IDs
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: Host IDs whose scan details you want to retrieve from the Qualys cloud. In this case, scan details of only those host IDs that have specified will be retrieved from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple hosts using a comma separator, or you can add a range of hosts using a hyphen (-).

parameters.title: Show Host with Minimum Host ID
parameters.name: id_min
parameters.tooltip: Show only hosts which have a minimum host ID value
parameters.description: Minimum Host ID value based on which you want to retrieve host details from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Host with Maximum Host ID
parameters.name: id_max
parameters.tooltip: Show only hosts which have a maximum host ID value
parameters.description: Maximum Host ID value based on which you want to retrieve host details from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Use Tags
parameters.description: Set this option as True, to include assets tags in the host details. By default, this is set to False.
parameters.name: use_tags

False.title: IPs/Ranges
False.name: ip
False.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
False.description: Show IP addresses or a range of IP addresses You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-).

False.title: Asset Group IDs
False.name: asset_group_ids
False.description: Asset Group IDs based on which you want to launch the compliance report on the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IDs using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IDs using a hyphen (-).

False.title: Asset Group Titles
False.name: asset_groups
False.description: Show only hosts belonging to asset groups with certain strings in the asset group title. One or more asset group titles may be specified. Multiple entries are comma separated.

True.title: Provide Tag Set By
True.name: tag_set_by
True.description: Select id (the default) to select a tag set by providing tag IDs. Select name to select a tag set by providing tag names. This is valid only when the Use Tags parameter is set to True.

True.title: Tag include Selector
True.name: tag_include_selector
True.description: Select Any (the default) to include hosts that match at least one of the selected tags. Select all to include hosts that match All of the selected tags.

True.title: Include Host with Tags Below
True.name: tag_set_include
True.description: Specify a tag set that you want to include in the scan. Hosts that match these tags will be included. You identify the tag set by providing tag name or IDs. You can enter multiple tag sets using a comma separator.

True.title: Tag Exclude Selector
True.name: tag_exclude_selector
True.description: Select Any (the default) to exclude hosts that match at least one of the selected tags. Select All to exclude hosts that match all of the selected tags.

True.title: Exclude Host with Tags Below
True.name: tag_set_exclude
True.description: Specify a tag set that you want to exclude from the scan. Hosts that match these tags will be included. You identify the tag set by providing tag name or IDs. You can enter multiple tag sets using a comma separator.

parameters.title: Show Host within Network IDs
parameters.name: network_ids
parameters.tooltip: Restrict the request to certain custom network IDs.Multiple network IDs are comma separated
parameters.description: Specify the Network ID, i.e., retrieves only hosts details that have the specified network ID from the Qualys cloud. Note: This parameter is valid only when the Network Support feature is enabled for the user’s account. You can enter multiple network IDs using a comma separator.

parameters.title: Show VM Scan Hosts Since
parameters.name: vm_scan_since
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts that were last scanned for vulnerabilities since a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve host details for those hosts that have been last scanned for vulnerabilities since the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Hosts Not VM Scanned Since
parameters.name: no_vm_scan_since
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts not scanned and processed since a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve host details for those hosts that have not been scanned from the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud. Note:This parameter cannot be specified with Show Hosts Scanned in Past Number of Days in the same request.

parameters.title: Show Hosts Scanned in Past Number of Days
parameters.name: max_days_since_last_vm_scan
parameters.tooltip: Show only hosts scanned and processed in the past number of days, where the value is a number of days.
parameters.description: Retrieve only hosts scanned and processed in the past number of days, value of which you specify, from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show VM Scan Processed Host Before
parameters.name: vm_processed_before
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with vulnerability scan results processed before a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve host details, from the Qualys cloud, for those hosts that have vulnerability scan results processed before the datetime you have specified in this field.

parameters.title: Show VM Processed Host After
parameters.name: vm_processed_after
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with vulnerability scan results processed after a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve host details, from the Qualys cloud, for those hosts that have vulnerability scan results processed after the datetime you have specified in this field.

parameters.title: Show Hosts with VM Scan End Date Before
parameters.name: vm_scan_date_before
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with a vulnerability scan end date before a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve host details, from the Qualys cloud, for those hosts that have vulnerability end date before the datetime you have specified in this field.

parameters.title: Show Hosts with VM Scan End Date After
parameters.name: vm_scan_date_after
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with a vulnerability scan end date after a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve host details, from the Qualys cloud, for those hosts that have vulnerability end date after the datetime you have specified in this field.

parameters.title: Show Hosts with VM Auth Scan Date Before
parameters.name: vm_auth_scan_date_before
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with a successful authenticated vulnerability scan end date before a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve host details, from the Qualys cloud, which have a successful authenticated vulnerability scan end date before a the date and time you have specified.

parameters.title: Show Hosts with VM Auth Scan Date After
parameters.name: vm_auth_scan_date_after
parameters.tooltip: Show hosts with a successful authenticated vulnerability scan end date after a certain
parameters.description: Retrieve host details, from the Qualys cloud, which have a successful authenticated vulnerability scan end date after a the date and time you have specified.

parameters.title: Show Hosts with Vulnearability Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Retrieve host details, from the Qualys cloud, which have one or more of these status values: New, Active, Re-Opened, Fixed. You can enter multiple status values using a comma separator.

parameters.title: Compliance Enabled
parameters.name: compliance_enabled
options: List hosts which are assigned to Policy Compliance Module
List hosts which are not assigned to Policy Compliance Module
parameters.description: Select one of the following options: List hosts which are assigned to Policy Compliance Module List hosts which are not assigned to Policy Compliance Module

parameters.title: OS Pattern
parameters.name: os_pattern
parameters.tooltip: e.g. ^Win.*64+bit.*Service+Pack+1 or ^Windows
parameters.description: Retrieve host details, from the Qualys cloud, which have an operating system that matches the regular expression that you have specified in this field. For example,^Win.*64+bit.*Service+Pack+1 or ^Windows

parameters.title: QIDs
parameters.name: qids
parameters.tooltip: Show only detection records with certain QIDs. Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: Retrieve host detection records, from the Qualys cloud, based on the QIDs you have specified. You must enter valid QIDs and you can enter multiple QIDs using a comma separator, or you can add a range of QIDs using a hyphen (-), for example, 68518-68522.

parameters.title: Severity Level
parameters.name: severities
parameters.description: Retrieve host details, from the Qualys cloud, which have one or more of these severity values: 1-Minimal, 2-Medium, 3-Serious, 4-Critical-Standard, or 5-Urgent.

parameters.title: Show Information Gathered
parameters.name: show_igs
options: Show Detection Records with Information Gathered
parameters.description: Select one of the options below:Show Detection Records with Information Gathered Hide Detection Record's Information Gathered Note: If you do not selected any option this information will not be shown.

parameters.title: Search List By
parameters.name: search_list
parameters.description: Show detection records based on following: IDs Titles

IDs.title: Include Search List IDs
IDs.name: include_search_list_ids
IDs.tooltip: This cannot be specified with QIDs, Severities or Include Search List Titles
IDs.description: Show detection records only when a record’s QID is included in one or more of the specified search list titles. One or more IDs may be specified. A range is specified with a dash (for example, 10-15). Multiple entries are comma separated You cannot specify this parameter with This cannot be specified with QIDs, Severities or Include Search List Titles.

IDs.title: Exclude Search List IDs
IDs.name: exclude_search_list_ids
IDs.tooltip: This cannot be specified with QIDs, Severities or Exclude Search List Titles
IDs.description: Show detection records only when a record’s QID is excluded from one or more of the specified search list titles. One or more IDs may be specified. A range is specified with a dash (for example, 40-42). Multiple entries are comma separated. This cannot be specified with QIDs, Severities or Exclude Search List Titles.

Titles.title: Include Search List Titles
Titles.name: include_search_list_titles
Titles.tooltip: This cannot be specified with QIDs, Severities or Include Search List IDs
Titles.description: Show detection records only when a record’s QID is included in one or more of the specified search list titles. One or more titles may be specified. Multiple titles are comma separated This cannot be specified with QIDs, Severities or Include Search List IDs.

Titles.title: Exclude Search List Titles
Titles.name: exclude_search_list_titles
Titles.tooltip: This cannot be specified with QIDs, Severities or Exclude Search List IDs
Titles.description: (Optional) Show detection records only when a record’s QID is excluded from one or more of the specified search list titles. One or more titles may be specified. Multiple titles are comma separated. This cannot be specified with QIDs, Severities or Exclude Search List IDs.

parameters.title: Show Results
parameters.name: show_results
parameters.tooltip: False: To exclude the results
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e, set it True (default) to include results in the output.

parameters.title: Show Reopened Information
parameters.name: show_reopened_info
parameters.tooltip: True :To include reopened info i.e. first/last reopened date, times reopened
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e, set it True to include reopened information, i.e., first/last reopened date, times reopened etc. When this option is not selected, i.e., set to False (default) reopened information for reopened vulnerabilities is not included in the output.

parameters.title: Kernel Filter
parameters.name: arf_kernel_filter
options: 0-Vulnerabilities are not filtered based on kernel activity
1-Exclude kernel related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable (found on non-running kernels)
2-Include kernel related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable (found on non-running kernels)
3-Include kernel related vulnerabilities that are exploitable (found on running kernels)
parameters.description: Filter for identifying vulnerabilities found on running or non-running Linux kernels. You can choose from the following options: 0-Vulnerabilities are not filtered based on kernel activity 1-Exclude kernel related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable (found on non-running kernels) 2-Include kernel related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable (found on non-running kernels) 3-Include kernel related vulnerabilities that are exploitable (found on running kernels) 4-Include kernel related vulnerabilities

parameters.title: Service Filter
parameters.name: arf_service_filter
options: 0-Vulnerabilities are not filtered based on running ports/services
1-Exclude service related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable (found on non-running ports/services)
2-Include service related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable (found on non-running ports/services)
3-Include exploitable service related vulnerabilities (found on running ports/services)
parameters.description: Filter for identifying vulnerabilities found on running or non-running ports/services. You can choose from the following options: 0-Vulnerabilities are not filtered based on running ports/services 1-Exclude service related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable (found on non-running ports/services) 2-Include service related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable (found on non-running ports/services) 3-Include exploitable service related vulnerabilities (found on running ports/services) 4-Include service related vulnerabilities

parameters.title: Configuration Filter
parameters.name: arf_config_filter
options: 0- Vulnerabilities are not filtered based on host configuration
1-Exclude vulnerabilities not exploitable due to host configuration
2-Include config related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable
3-Include config related vulnerabilities that are exploitable
parameters.description: Filter for identifying vulnerabilities that might or might not be exploitable due to the current host configuration. You can choose from the following options: 0- Vulnerabilities are not filtered based on host configuration 1-Exclude vulnerabilities not exploitable due to host configuration 2-Include config related vulnerabilities that are not exploitable 3-Include config related vulnerabilities that are exploitable 4-Include config related vulnerabilities

parameters.title: Output Format
parameters.name: output_format
parameters.description: Format of the host detection list output retrieved from Qualys. When you do not specify the output format, then the default output format is XML. Forllowing are valid output format values: XML, CSV, or CSV_No_Metadata.

parameters.title: Suppress Duplicated Data From CSV
parameters.name: suppress_duplicated_data_from_csv
parameters.description: Clear this option, i.e., set it to False (default) to repeat host details in each line of detection information in the CSV output. When this option is selected, i.e., set to True, host details will not be repeated (suppressed) in each detection line.You must specify this parameter only if the output format is selected as CSV, or CSV_No_Metadata.

parameters.title: Truncation Limit
parameters.name: truncation_limit
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of host records that are processed per request. By default, this is set to 1000 records. You can specify a value less than the default (1-999), or greater than the default (1001-1000000).
parameters.description: Maximum number of host records that are processed per request from the Qualys cloud. By default, this is set to 1000 records. You can specify a value less than the default (1-999), or greater than the default (1001-1000000).

parameters.title: Maximum Days Since Detection Updated
parameters.name: max_days_since_detection_updated
parameters.tooltip: Show only detections whose detection status changed since some maximum number of days specified
parameters.description: Retrieve only those detections from Qualys whose detection status ihs changed since some maximum number of days you specify. For detections that have never changed, the maximum number of days is applied as the last detection date.

parameters.title: Detection Updated Since
parameters.name: detection_updated_since
parameters.tooltip: Show only detections whose detection status changed after a certain date and time.
parameters.description: Retrieve only those detections from Qualys whose detection status has changed after the date and time you have specified. For detections that have never changed the date is applied as the last detection date.

parameters.title: Detection Updated Before
parameters.name: detection_updated_before
parameters.tooltip: Show only detections whose detection status changed before a certain date and time.
parameters.description: Retrieve only those detections from Qualys whose detection status has changed before the date and time you have specified.

parameters.title: Dectection Processed Before
parameters.name: dectection_processed_before
parameters.tooltip: Show detections with vulnerability scan results processed before a certain date and time.
parameters.description: Retrieve only those detections from Qualys whose vulnerability scan results are processed before the date and time you have specified.

parameters.title: Dectection Processed After
parameters.name: dectection_processed_after
parameters.tooltip: Show detections with vulnerability scan results processed after a certain date and time.
parameters.description: Retrieve only those detections from Qualys whose vulnerability scan results are processed after the date and time you have specified.

parameters.title: Download Result As an Attachment
parameters.name: add_vuln_as_attachment
parameters.tooltip: True:To add detections with vulnerability scan results in a file and add it as an attachment in CyOPs™
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True to add detections with vulnerability scan results in a file and add it as an attachment in CyOPs™. Clear this option, i.e., set it to False (default) to include detections with vulnerability scan results in the connector output.

operations.title: Manage Virtual Host
operations.description: Manages a virtual host on the Qualys cloud, based on the IP addresses, actions, and other input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: Action
parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action that you want to perform on the virtual host on the Qualys cloud. You must choose one of the following actions: Create: Creates a virtual host on the Qualys cloud. Update: Update or edit an existing virtual host on the Qualys cloud. Delete: Deletes a virtual host from the Qualys cloud. Add FQDN: Adds one or more FQDNs to an existing virtual host on the Qualys cloud. Delete FQDN: Removes one or more FQDNs from an existing virtual host on the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: IP address that you will use for virtual host configuration on the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Port
parameters.name: port
parameters.description: A port number that you will use for the virtual host configuration on the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Fully Qualified Domain Name
parameters.name: fqdn
parameters.tooltip: Required for all actions except 'DELETE'
parameters.description: One or more FQDNs that you will use for virtual host configuration on the Qualys cloud. Note: You must fill this field for all actions, except the Delete action.

operations.title: Get Virtual Host List
operations.description: Retrieves the list and details of all virtual hosts that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific virtual hosts based on the input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: Port
parameters.name: port
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieve details only for those hosts that have the port that you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: (Optional) Retrieve details only for those hosts that have the IP address that you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

operations.title: Manage Excluded Host
operations.description: Manages an excluded host on the Qualys cloud, based on the IP addresses, actions, and other input parameters you have specified

Add.title: IPs/Ranges
Add.name: ips
Add.description: IP addresses that you want to add or remove from your excluded IPs list on the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator.

Add.title: Comment
Add.name: comment
Add.description: User-defined notes that you want to add while managing excluded hosts on the Qualys cloud.

Add.title: Expiry Days
Add.name: expiry_days
Add.tooltip: Specify the number of days the IPs being added to the excluded IPs list
Add.description: (Optional) The number of days the IPs being added to the excluded IPs list will be considered valid for exclusion. When the expiration is reached, the IPs are removed from the list and made available again for scanning. When unspecified, the IPs being added have no expiration and will remain on the list until removed by a user.

Add.title: Distribution Group Names
Add.name: dg_names
Add.tooltip: Specify Distribution Group name who will be notified 7 days before hosts are removed from the excluded hosts list. Multiple group names are comma separated
Add.description: (Optional) Specify users who will be notified 7 days before hosts are removed from the excluded hosts list (i.e. supply distribution group names as defined in the Qualys UI). Multiple distribution groups are comma separated. A maximum of 15 distribution groups may be entered.

Add.title: Network ID
Add.name: network_id
Add.description: (Optional) Specify a Network ID that is assigned to the IPs being removed from the excluded IPs list. By default, the user’s default network ID is assigned. Note: This parameter is valid when the user making the request has access to more than one network.

Remove.title: IPs/Ranges
Remove.name: ips
Remove.description: IP addresses that you want to add or remove from your excluded IPs list on the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator.

Remove.title: Comment
Remove.name: comment
Remove.description: User-defined notes that you want to add while managing excluded hosts on the Qualys cloud.

Remove.title: Network ID
Remove.name: network_id
Remove.description: (Optional) Specify a Network ID that is assigned to the IPs being removed from the excluded IPs list. By default, the user’s default network ID is assigned. Note: This parameter is valid when the user making the request has access to more than one network.

Remove All.title: Comment
Remove All.name: comment
Remove All.description: User-defined notes that you want to add while managing excluded hosts on the Qualys cloud.

Remove All.title: Network ID
Remove All.name: network_id
Remove All.description: (Optional) Specify a Network ID that is assigned to the IPs being removed from the excluded IPs list. By default, the user’s default network ID is assigned. Note: This parameter is valid when the user making the request has access to more than one network.

operations.title: Get Excluded Host List
operations.description: Retrieves the list and details of all excluded hosts that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific excluded hosts based on the input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: IPs/Ranges
parameters.name: ips
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: Retrieve the list of only for those excluded IP address(es) that you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud. If you do not specify any IP addresses, then all excluded IP addresses and IP ranges are retrieved from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-).

parameters.title: Network ID
parameters.name: network_id
parameters.description: Retrieve the list of only for those excluded IP address(es) that belong to the Network ID that you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud. Note: This parameter is valid only when the Network Support feature is enabled for the user’s account.

operations.title: Get Option Profiles
operations.description: Retrieves the list and details of available option profiles from the user's account on the Qualys cloud

operations.title: Get Scanner Appliance
operations.description: Retrieves the list and details of available scanner appliances from the user's account on the Qualys cloud

parameters.title: Scan Reference
parameters.name: scan_ref
parameters.tooltip: The scan reference code starts with a string that identifies the scan type: “scan/” for a vulnerability scan, “compliance/” for a compliance scan, “was/” for a web application scan, “qscap/” for an FDCC scan, or “map/” for a network map.
parameters.description: Scan reference code based on which you to retrieve the scanner appliances that are running a particular scan on Qualys. You can enter a valid scan reference code for a currently running scan.

parameters.title: Scanner Appliances's Name
parameters.tooltip: Shows Scanner Appliances that have name matching the string provided
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name based on which you want to retrieve the list of scanner appliances (physical and virtual) from Qualys. If you specify a name, then this operation will return only those scanner appliances that have names matching the string that you have specified.

parameters.title: Scanner Appliance IDs
parameters.tooltip: Multiple IDs are comma separated
parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: IDs based on which you want to retrieve the list of scanner appliances (physical and virtual) from Qualys. If you specify IDs, then this operation will return only those scanner appliances that have IDs matching the IDs that you have specified. You can specify multiple IDs using a comma separator.

parameters.title: Busy
options: Show appliances which are not currently running scans
(Default) Show appliances which are currently running scan
parameters.value: (Default) Show appliances which are currently running scan
parameters.name: busy
parameters.tooltip: If not selected, all scanner appliances in the user account are shown
parameters.description: If you do not select any of the following options, then all scanner appliances in the user account will be retrieved from Qualys: Show appliances which are not currently running scans (Default) Show appliances which are currently running scan

parameters.title: Scan Detail
parameters.name: scan_detail
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True to include scan details for scans currently running on the scanner appliance. Clear this option, i.e., set it to False (default) to exclude scan details. Scan detail includes scan ID, title, scan reference, scan type, and scan date.

parameters.title: Output Mode
parameters.name: output_mode
parameters.description: Amount of detail to be retrieved from Qualys for each scanner appliance in the output. You can select from the following options: Brief (default): Includes this information for each appliance: appliance ID, friendly name, software version, the number of running scans, and heartbeat check status (online or offline) Full : includes the full appliance information, including the same details available in the Qualys user interface If you choose Full, then you can optionally specify the following parameters:

Full.title: Show Tags
Full.tooltip: False:Not to include asset tag information in the output
Full.name: show_tags
Full.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True (default) to include asset tag information for each scanner appliance in the output.

Full.title: Include Cloud Info
Full.tooltip: True:To include cloud information in the output for virtual scanner appliances
Full.name: include_cloud_info
Full.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True, to include cloud information in the output for virtual scanner appliances deployed on cloud platforms. For example, Amazon EC2, Microsoft Azure Cloud Platform, or Google Cloud Platform. Clear this option, i.e., set it to False (default) to exclude cloud information.

Full.title: Scanner Appliance Type
Full.placeholder: Select one of the Scanner Type
Full.name: type
Full.description: Select one of the following scanner appliance types: Physical, Virtual, or Offline.

parameters.title: Include License Information
parameters.tooltip: True:To return virtual scanner license information in the output
parameters.name: include_license_info
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True to include virtual scanner license information. Clear this option, i.e., set it to False (default) to exclude virtual scanner license information. License information includes the number of licenses you have and the number of licenses you have used.

operations.title: VM - Launch Scan
operations.description: Launches vulnerability scans in the user’s account on the Qualys cloud, based on the input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: Scan Title
parameters.name: scan_title
parameters.description: (Optional) Title of the vulnerability scan that you want to run on the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Option Profile
parameters.name: opt_pro
parameters.tooltip: Provide one of the parameter from Option ID or Option Title
parameters.description: Option based on which you want to run the vulnerability scan on the Qualys cloud. You must select Option ID or Option Title.

Option ID.title: Option ID
Option ID.name: option_id
Option ID.description: ID of option profile to be used for launching the scan that you want to run on the Qualys cloud.

Option Title.title: Option Title
Option Title.name: option_title
Option Title.description: Title of option profile to be used for launching the scan that you want to run on the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Processing Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: (Optional) Processing priority level for the vulnerability scan that you want to run on the Qualys cloud. You can select any value between 0-9. If you do not choose any value, then the value of 0, i.e. no priority is assigned You can select from one of the following values: 0: No Priority (default value) 1: Emergency 2: Ultimate 3: Critical 4: Major 5: High 6: Standard 7: Medium 8: Minor 9: Low

parameters.title: Scanner Appliance
parameters.name: scan_app
parameters.description: Scanner Appliance that you want to use for the vulnerability scan that you want to run on the Qualys cloud. You must select Scanner ID or Scanner Name.

Scanner ID.title: Scanner ID
Scanner ID.name: iscanner_id
Scanner ID.description: IDs of the scanner appliances to be used for launching the scan that you want to run on the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IDs using a comma separator.

Scanner Name.title: Scanner Name
Scanner Name.name: iscanner_name
Scanner Name.description: Friendly names of the scanner appliances to be used for launching the scan that you want to run on the Qualys cloud. Specify External for external scanners. You can enter multiple names using a comma separator

parameters.title: Default Scanner
parameters.name: default_scanner
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option, i.e., set it to True, if you want to use the default scanner in each target asset group for the scan that you want to run on the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Choose Target Host to Scan From
parameters.name: target_from
parameters.description: Assets: Specify the IP addresses/ranges and/or asset groups that you want to scan on the Qualys cloud. Tags: Specify the asset tags based on which you want to run the scan on the Qualys cloud.

Assets.title: IPs/Ranges
Assets.name: ip
Assets.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
Assets.description: IP addresses on which you want to run the compliance scan on the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-).

Assets.title: Asset Group IDs
Assets.name: asset_group_ids
Assets.description: IDs of the asset groups in which you want to run the compliance scan on the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple asset group IDs using a comma separator. You can specify either the Asset Group IDs or the Asset Groups but not both.

Assets.title: Asset Groups Titles
Assets.name: asset_groups
Assets.description: Titles of the asset groups on which you want to run the compliance scan on the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple asset titles using a comma separator. You can specify either the Asset Group IDs or the Asset Groups but not both.

Assets.title: Exclude IP Per Scan
Assets.name: exclude_ip_per_scan
Assets.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
Assets.description: IP addresses that you want to exclude from the compliance scan on the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-).

Assets.title: Scanners in Asset Group
Assets.name: scanners_in_ag
Assets.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True to distribute the scan to the target asset groups’ scanner appliances. Appliances in each asset group are tasked with scanning the IPs in the group.

Tags.title: Provide Tag Set By
Tags.name: tag_set_by
Tags.description: Select id (the default) to select a tag set by providing tag IDs. Select name to select a tag set by providing tag names. This is valid only when the Use Tags parameter is set to True.

Tags.title: Tag include Selector
Tags.name: tag_include_selector
Tags.description: Select Any (the default) to include hosts that match at least one of the selected tags. Select all to include hosts that match All of the selected tags.

Tags.title: Include Host with Tags Below
Tags.name: tag_set_include
Tags.description: Specify a tag set that you want to include in the scan. Hosts that match these tags will be included. You identify the tag set by providing tag name or IDs. You can enter multiple tag sets using a comma separator.

Tags.title: Tag Exclude Selector
Tags.name: tag_exclude_selector
Tags.description: Select Any (the default) to exclude hosts that match at least one of the selected tags. Select All to exclude hosts that match all of the selected tags.

Tags.title: Exclude Host with Tags Below
Tags.name: tag_set_exclude
Tags.description: Specify a tag set that you want to exclude from the scan. Hosts that match these tags will be included. You identify the tag set by providing tag name or IDs. You can enter multiple tag sets using a comma separator.

Tags.title: Use IP in Network Range Tags
Tags.name: use_ip_nt_range_tags
Tags.tooltip: True: To scan all IP addresses defined in tags.
Tags.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True to scan all IP addresses defined in tags. Clear this option, i.e, set to False (the default) to select from all tags (tags with any tag rule).

Tags.title: Scanners In Tagset
Tags.name: scanners_in_tagset
Tags.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True to distribute the scan to scanner appliances that match the asset tags specified for the scan target. By default, this is set to False.

parameters.title: Runtime Http Header
parameters.name: runtime_http_header
parameters.description: (Optional) Sets a custom value in order to drop defenses (such as logging, IPs, etc.) when an authorized scan is being run. The value you enter will be used in the “Qualys-Scan:” header that will be set for many CGI and web application fingerprinting checks. Some discovery and web server fingerprinting checks will not use this header.

parameters.title: IP Network ID
parameters.name: ip_network_id
parameters.description: (Optional) ID of a network used to filter the IP addresses or IP ranges specified in the IPs/Ranges parameter. Specify a custom network ID, or specify 0, which is the default for the Global Default Network - this is used to scan hosts outside of your custom networks. Note: This parameter is valid only when the Network Support feature is enabled for the user’s account

operations.title: VM - Get Scan List
operations.description: Retrieves the list and details of all vulnerability scans that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific vulnerability scans based on the input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: Scan Reference
parameters.name: scan_ref
parameters.description: Scan Reference for which you want to retrieve vulnerability scan details from the Qualys cloud. For a vulnerability scan, the format is: scan/987659876.19876

parameters.title: Scan State
parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Scan state(s) for which you want to retrieve vulnerability scan details from the Qualys cloud. Select one or more scan states from the available options: Running, Paused, Canceled, Finished, Error, Queued (scan job is waiting to be distributed to scanner(s), or Loading (scanner(s) are finished, and scan results are being loaded onto the platform).

parameters.title: Scan Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of scan or which you want to retrieve vulnerability scan details from the Qualys cloud. You can select one of the following options: On Demand, Scheduled, or API.

parameters.title: Target IPs
parameters.name: target
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: IP addresses whose vulnerability scan details you want to retrieve from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-).

parameters.title: User Who Launched Scan
parameters.name: user_login
parameters.tooltip: Enter the login name for a valid Qualys user account.
parameters.description: Vulnerability scan details will be retrieved from the Qualys cloud based on the user login that you specify in this field.

parameters.title: Show Scan Launched After Datetime
parameters.name: launched_after_datetime
parameters.tooltip: Show only scans launched after a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve vulnerability scan details for all vulnerability scans that were launched after the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Show Scan Launched Before Datetime
parameters.name: launched_before_datetime
parameters.tooltip: Show only scans launched before a certain date and time
parameters.description: Retrieve vulnerability scan details for all vulnerability scans that were launched before the datetime you have specified in this field from the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Processed Scan
options: Show scans that are Not Processed
parameters.name: processed
parameters.description: Process state(s) of the vulnerability scans whose details you want to retrieve from the Qualys cloud. You can select Show only Processed scans or Show scans that are not Processed scans. If you do not specify any option, then the scan list output is not filtered based on the processed state.

parameters.title: Show Asset Group Information
parameters.name: show_ags
parameters.tooltip: True: Shows Asset Group Information in Output
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True, to include asset group information for each vulnerability scan in the output. By default, this is set to False, and the asset group information is not included in the output.

parameters.title: Show Option Profile Information
parameters.name: show_op
parameters.tooltip: True: Shows Option Profile Information in Output
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True, to include option profile information for each vulnerability scan in the output. By default, this is set to False, and the option profile information is not included in the output.

parameters.title: Show Scan Status
parameters.name: show_status
parameters.tooltip: False: Not to Shows Scan Status for each Scan in Output
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True, to include the status information for each vulnerability scan in the output. By default, this is set to True.

parameters.title: Show Most Recent Scan
parameters.name: show_last
parameters.tooltip: True: Shows only the most recent scan
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True, to include only the most recent vulnerability scan (which meets all other search filters in the request) information in the output. By default, this is set to False, and all vulnerability scans are included in the output.

operations.title: VM - Fetch Scan
operations.description: Downloads all the vulnerability management scan results from the Qualys cloud, or specific vulnerability management scan results based on the input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: Scan Reference
parameters.name: scan_ref
parameters.description: Scan Reference for which you want to retrieve vulnerability management scan results from the Qualys cloud. Format for this field is: scan/987659876.19876

parameters.title: IPs/Ranges
parameters.name: ips
parameters.tooltip: Multiple entries or ranges are supported
parameters.description: IP addresses whose vulnerability management scan results you want to retrieve from the Qualys cloud. You can enter multiple IP addresses using a comma separator, or you can add a range of IP addresses using a hyphen (-).

parameters.title: Scan Result Details
parameters.name: mode
parameters.tooltip: Choose the amount of scan result information you want to retrieve
parameters.description: Mode based on which information of the vulnerability management scan results will be retrieved from the Qualys cloud. You can enter choose from the following options: Brief: This is the default option, and it includes the IP address, DNS hostname, NetBIOS hostname, QID and scan test results if applicable. Extended: Includes the brief output plus following extended information: protocol, port, an SSL flag (“yes” is returned when SSL was used for the detection, “no” is returned when SSL was not used), and FQDN if applicable.

parameters.title: Download Result As an Attachment
parameters.name: add_vuln_as_attachment
parameters.tooltip: True: To add VM scan results in a file and add it as an attachment in CyOPs™
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to True to download VM scan results in a file and add it as an attachment in CyOPs™.  The VM scan must have the status “Finished”, “Canceled”, “Paused” or “Error” in order to download the scan results. Clear this option, i.e., set it to False (default) to include VM scan results  in the connector output.

operations.title: VM - Manage Scan
operations.description: Manages a vulnerability management scan on the Qualys cloud, based on the scan reference and actions you have specified

parameters.title: Action
parameters.name: action
parameters.tooltip: Select action that you want to perform on the vulnerability scan
parameters.description: Action that you want to perform on the vulnerability scan that you want to manage on the  Qualys cloud. You must choose one of the following actions:  Cancel: Stops a vulnerability scan that is in progress on the Qualys cloud. Pause: Stops a vulnerability scan that is in progress on the Qualys cloud and changes its status to Paused. Resume: Restarts a vulnerability scan that has been paused on the Qualys cloud. Delete: Deletes a vulnerability scan from your user account on the Qualys cloud.

parameters.title: Scan Reference
parameters.name: scan_ref
parameters.description: Reference of the vulnerability scan that you want to manage, i.e., on which you want to perform the specified action on the Qualys cloud. Format for this field is: scan/987659876.19876

parameters.title: Option Profile

parameters.description: Option based on which you want to run the compliance scan on the Qualys cloud. You must select Option ID or Option Title.

Tags.title: Provide Tag Set By
